statements: DELETE FROM parking_permits WHERE permit_type = 'Resident' AND permit_status = 'Suspended';
DELETE FROM parking_permits WHERE permit_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND permit_status IN ('Active', 'Suspended')
DELETE FROM parking_permits WHERE permit_fee > 1000 AND permit_type = 'Resident'
DELETE FROM ParkingPermitInfo WHERE permit_id = 100 AND issue_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM parking_permits WHERE permit_id = 100 AND vehicle_id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'car')
DELETE FROM parking_permits WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31'
DELETE FROM parking_location WHERE location_name = 'Parking Lot A';
